```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

nycrest =
  rest_inspec %>%
  filter(critical_flag %in% c("Critical")) %>%
  filter(boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  drop_na(score) %>%
  drop_na(grade) %>%
  filter(grade %in% c("A","B","C")) %>%
  filter(inspection_type %in% c("Cycle Inspection / Re-inspection",
                                "Cycle Inspection / Initial Inspection")) %>%
  filter(action %in% c("Violations were cited in the following area(s)."))
  
  

  

unique(pull(rest_inspec, grade))
table(pull(rest_inspec, critical_flag))
table(pull(rest_inspec, boro))
table(pull(rest_inspec, grade))
table(pull(nycrest, critical_flag))
table(pull(nycrest, grade))
unique(pull(nycrest,inspection_type))
unique(pull(nycrest,action))
```
